name: Movetropolis
description:
It is a game about moving to a new home.

You control a fleet of trucks, that are destined to move peoples boxes around.
Move enough boxes and earn enough money to have the largest fleet of Movetropolis!

Made for Global Game Jam 2019.

Instructions:

Left click and drag to select vehicles.

When you have selected vehicles, Right click and drag to draw a path that they will drive.

The goal is to move boxes from one location to the corresponding color. Locations with boxes on top of the houses is the collection point and the location with X out of Y is the drop off point.
